Protocol","details":"This contract handles position management, token swapping, and collateral operations The Position contract represents a user's lending position in the Ibran protocol. It manages collateral assets, borrow assets, and provides functionality for: - Withdrawing collateral - Swapping tokens within the position - Repaying loans with selected tokens - Calculating token values and exchange rates Key features: - Reentrancy protection for secure operations - Dynamic token list management - Price oracle integration for accurate valuations - Restricted access control (only lending pool can call certain functions)","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Liquidate(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address of the user whose position was liquidated"}},"SwapToken(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens being swapped","token":"The address of the token being swapped","user":"The address of the user performing the swap"}},"SwapTokenByPosition(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","amountOut":"The amount of output tokens received","tokenIn":"The address of the input token","tokenOut":"The address of the output token","user":"The address of the user initiating the swap"}},"WithdrawCollateral(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of collateral withdrawn","user":"The address of the user withdrawing collateral"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"_calculateExpectedAmountWithPriceFeeds(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"This function tokens"},"returns":{"expectedAmount":"The expected amount of output tokens"}},"constructor":{"details":"Sets up the initial position with collateral and borrow assets","params":{"_lpAddress":"The address of the lending pool","_user":"The address of the user who owns this position"}},"repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address)":{"details":"Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstAny excess tokens after repayment are swapped back to the original token","params":{"_token":"The address of the token to use for repayment","amount":"The amount to repay"}},"swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only the position owner can call this functionUses DragonSwap router for token swapping with slippage protection","params":{"_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token","amountIn":"The amount of input tokens to swap","slippageTolerance":"The slippage tolerance in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)"},"returns":{"amountOut":"The amount of output tokens received"}},"tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"Uses PriceFeedIOracle price feeds to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically","params":{"_amountIn":"The amount of input tokens","_tokenIn":"The address of the input token","_tokenInPrice":"The address of the input token's price feed","_tokenOut":"The address of the output token","_tokenOutPrice":"The address of the output token's price feed"},"returns":{"_0":"The calculated output amount"}},"tokenValue(address)":{"details":"Uses PriceFeedIOracle price feeds to get current token pricesReturns value normalized to 18 decimals for _calculateExpectedAmountWithPriceFeeds(a.details: This function will revert if price feeds are not available

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns.expectedAmount: The expected amount of output tokens

constructor.details: Sets up the initial position with collateral and borrow assets

params._lpAddress: The address of the lending pool
params._user: The address of the user who owns this position

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionIf the selected token is not the borrow asset, it will be swapped firstAny excess tokens after repayment are swapped back to the original token

params._token: The address of the token to use for repayment

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.details: Only the position owner can call this functionUses DragonSwap router for token swapping with slippage protection

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token
params.amountIn: The amount of input tokens to swap
params.slippageTolerance: The slippage tolerance in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)

returns.amountOut: The amount of output tokens received

tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,.details: Uses PriceFeedIOracle price feeds to determine exchange ratesHandles different token decimals automatically

params._tokenIn: The address of the input token
params._tokenInPrice: The address of the input token's price feed
params._tokenOut: The address of the output token
params._tokenOutPrice: The address of the output token's price feed

tokenValue(address).details: Uses PriceFeedIOracle price feeds to get current token pricesReturns value normalized to 18 decimals for consistency

params.token: The address of the token to calculate value for

returns._0: The USD value of the token balance (in 18 decimals)

withdrawCollateral(uint256,address,bool).details: Only the lending pool can call this functionTransfers collateral tokens to the specified user

params._user: The address of the user to receive the collateral
params.amount: The amount of collateral to withdraw
params.unwrapToNative: Whether to unwrap WKAIA to native KAIA for user

_calculateExpectedAmountWithPriceFeeds(a.notice: Internal function to calculate expected amount using price feeds

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize a new position

owner().notice: The collateral token address for this position

repayWithSelectedToken(uint256,address).notice: Repays a loan using a selected token

swapTokenByPosition(address,address,uint.notice: Swaps tokens within the position using DragonSwap

tokenCalculator(address,address,uint256,.notice: Calculates the output amount for a token swap based on price feeds

tokenLists(uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to token address

tokenListsId(address).notice: Mapping from token address to token ID

tokenValue(address).notice: Calculates the USD value of a token balance in the position
